document_data.name: Seerah
document_data.Description: She had pale skin and blonde hair. She wore worn [[leather armor]] with a [[short sword]] at her hip and a [[crossbow]] on her back.
document_data.Personality: She did not speak much, and when she did it was often to curse.
document_data.History: Seerah was killed in [[1479 DR]] when [[Duvan]] threw a dagger coated with a paralyzing poison into her thigh.
